name: Terry L. COURTNEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Prison ex rel., Health Services, Deb Cutshall, Dr. Naji, Medical Director, Corrections Health Care Administrator, Debra Younkin, all Individuals and in their Official Capacity, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Courtney v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Terry L. COURTNEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Prison ex rel., Health Services, Deb Cutshall, Dr. Naji, Medical Director, Corrections Health Care Administrator, Debra Younkin, all Individuals and in their Official Capacity, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of January, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

15 A.3d 884
